document_title: Foreign bodies in the eye: Causes, signs and dangerous complications
subsection_name: di-vat-trong-mat.json_7_Self-care at home after treating a foreign body in the eye
subsection_content:
Once the foreign object in your eye is removed, you can take care of your eyes at home. But there are some tips to keep in mind:
During treatment, you should not drive until the eye patch is removed and your vision is restored.; If you experience eye discomfort, you can use pain relievers containing paracetamol or ibuprofen. Follow the instructions on the packaging carefully.; Avoid working with machinery or at heights.; Use eye drops or ointments to prevent infection.; In particular, you need to follow your doctor's advice on schedule to ensure the most effective treatment.
Use eye drops or ointments to prevent infection.
